DISSEMINATE_EVALUATIONS_VIEW - Static variable in interface edu.neu.ccis.sms.constants.JspViews
Key for disseminate evaluations for a particular submittable member to students page
DisseminateEvaluationsServlet - Class in edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets
Servlet implementation class DisseminateEvaluationsServlet; This servlet serves requests to disseminate evaluations for a submittable member to their submitters; As each submission from submitters can have multiple evaluators alloted, we first need to calculate the final evaluation for each submission from all the evaluations received from those evaluators.
DisseminateEvaluationsServlet() - Constructor for class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.DisseminateEvaluationsServlet

doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.AllocateToEvaluators
This servlet allocates evaluators to grade the submissions; and it takes two request parameters, 1) memberId - submittable member for which reviewers to be allocated 2) numberOfEvaluatorsPerSub - number of reviewers/evaluators to allocate per submission for this submittable member; if the value is more than actually available number of evaluators, then allocates only available number of evaluators to submissions
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.DisseminateEvaluationsServlet
Calculate the final Evaluations for all the submitted documents for given submittable memberId; As each submission from submitters can have multiple evaluators alloted, we first need to calculate the final evaluation for each submission from all the evaluations received from those evaluators.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.DocumentRetrievalServlet
Download the submission documents for given submittable member as ZIP file.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.GetUsersByRoleServlet
Get the user's list by their role for a registerable member; Takes two request parameters : 1) memberId - id of a registerable member for which we are retrieving users list 2) roleType - role for which we are retrieving users list
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.LoginServlet
Validates username and password of user and if authenticated, then creates a new Http Session, else forward them back to login screen
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.LogutServlet
Invalidate current logged-in user's http session and forward him/her back to login screen
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.members.AddRoleToMemberServlet
When the request is received,
If user does not already have that role for member, assign current user selected role on the selected member
Else display an error message indicating that they already have the role on the member.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.members.CreateMemberServlet
On receiving the request creates a new member, if a member name is unique for its direct parent member.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.members.CreateNewMemberFormServlet
Upon receiving the request respond with new member form for the given category and parent member,
If the user has conductor access on the given parent member,
Else respond with an authorized member creation error message.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.members.ReadActiveMembersServlet
When the request is received, it provides all the active child members for given category, with their parent as the given parent member id.

doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.members.ReadMembersServlet
When the request is received, it provides all child members for given category, with their parent as the given parent member id.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.members.ReadSubmittablesForMemberServlet
When the request is received retrieves all the submittables for the current member,
If none exist, then return a help message indicating that no submittable child members have been created for this member yet.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.members.RegisterUserForMemberServlet
When the request is received assign the current user, the given role on the given member, if they do not already have that role for member, else display an error message indicating that they already have the role on the member.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.members.ToggleMemberActivationServlet
When the request is received toggles the current activation state of the member between active and inactive state.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.members.UpdateMemberServlet
When the request is received, update the new details for the member into the database, ensuring the constraint that the new name of the member, if updated does not already exist for the parent member.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.RegisterUser
Takes form attributes for user-registration and create a new user into SMS system Takes 6 request attributes - 1) username - username to be used by user for logging in to the SMS system 2) firstname - first name of user 3) lastname - last name of user 4) email id - email id of user - this should be a unique email id 5) password - password for user 6) confirmPassword - To make sure that user has put confirmed the password Note - This is just user creation servlet; registering a user to members is not part of this servlet; for that user should login first, and access register-member UI page.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.UpdateCOIForUserServlet
Takes user's email-ids with whom this logged-in user has conflicts of interest with; This servlet can be used to Add, modify and delete - user ids from Conflicts of Interest list of users Takes request parameters: 1) "submitType" - There can be 3 submit types - a) "Add" - To add new users to conflicts of interest list, b) "Replace" - Modify conflicts of interest list - here it removes old list of users with new list of users, c) "Clear" - To delete all users from conflicts of interest list 2) "coifield" - email ids of users with whom this user has conflicts of interest with
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.UpdateTOIForUserServlet
Saves user's topics of interests/preferences as list of strings into persistent store; Using this servlet we can Add, Modify or Delete the topics of preferences This servlet can be used to Add, modify and delete - topics of interests/preferences list Takes request parameters: 1) "submitType" - There can be 3 submit types - a) "Add" - To add new topics to topics of interests/preferences list, b) "Replace" - Modify topics of interests/preferences list - here it removes old list of topics with new list of topics, c) "Clear" - To delete all old topics of interests/preferences 2) "toifield" - topic name to be added/modifed into topics of interests/preferences list
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.UploadEvaluationsServlet
Saves document submission evaluations uploaded by Evaluator into SMS system; As every evaluator is mapped/allocated with fixed set of submitters, this servlet saves only evaluations for users for whom this EVALUATOR user is mapped with.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.UploadForMember
Uploads submission document for submittable member by current logged-in submitter user; Upon receiving file upload submission, parses the request to read upload data and saves the file at temporary location on disk before uploading it into CMS.
DOWNLOAD_SUBMISSIONS_VIEW - Static variable in interface edu.neu.ccis.sms.constants.JspViews
Key for downloading submissions for evaluation page
downloadDocument(String, String) - Static method in class edu.neu.ccis.sms.util.CMISConnector
Download the document to given filepath from CMS repository
